thread.title: Omni-ID Featured as a Top Enterprise Asset Management Solution Provider by CIOReview
thread.title_full: Omni-ID Featured as a Top Enterprise Asset Management Solution Provider by CIOReview

author: admin
title: Omni-ID Featured as a Top Enterprise Asset Management Solution Provider by CIOReview
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 6:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Omni-ID 
ROCHESTER, NY--(Marketwired - October 09, 2015) - Omni - ID , the leading global supplier of high-performance, industrial RFID tags and ProVIEW visual tagging systems today announced that it has been featured by CIOReview Magazine as one of the Top Enterprise Asset Management Solution Providers for 2015. 
"The ability to track and locate high-value assets can be a challenge for any business, particularly for industry," said George E. Daddis, Jr. PhD, CEO of Omni-ID. "Operational efficiencies and often the need to meet compliance requirements are driving enterprises across industries to move away from relying on manual processes alone. We've taken the time to work directly with our customers, understand their business and help them to take the necessary steps toward going paperless. We're honored to be recognized for our demonstrated ability to develop innovative, Internet of Things solutions based on auto-ID technologies to solve enterprise asset management challenges." 
The feature, published in the October Issue of CIOReview, highlights Omni-ID's historical leadership in providing innovative technologies, the company's current asset management solutions for industry, and its focus on an IoT future. The complete research report can be found at: www.omni-id.com/cioreview 
About Omni-ID 
Based in Rochester, NY, Omni-ID has developed original, patented technologies for on-metal and visual tagging to enable a broad range of applications to improve asset tracking, supply chain management and work-in-process. Omni-ID is the leading supplier of RFID tags and visual tagging systems for Manufacturing & Logistics, Energy, IT Assets and Tool Tracking. Omni-ID's versatile family of products provides a complete range of tags and auto-ID solutions for tracking and identification challenges, with unprecedented accuracy, in any environment. For more information, visit www.omni-id.com .
